title: Ulysses S Grant National Historic Site: Places To Go
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go             Places To Go      Watch the 16-minute introductory film in the Visitor Center. Walk the ¼ mile historic trace and see the historic outbuildings that were necessary on the farm.          White Haven's Main House. NPS photo.  Visit the Main House to learn about the people who lived and worked at White Haven in the 19th century.
